# ğŸ§± Bookshelf Block

  Manage blocks, including states and NBTs, while offering advanced tools for seamless transformations.

> "Architecture is the thoughtful making of space."
> â€” Louis Kahn

## âœ¨ Features

- **ğŸ” Get**: Get the block state, NBT data or type and store it into a storage.
- **âš™ï¸ Set**: Set the block state, NBT data or type from a storage to a block.
- **ğŸ”„ Transform**: Transform stored block data; mix different block data (for example stone + oak stairs = stone stairs).
- **âœ… Check**: Check if a block is a certain type, has a certain NBT data or state.
- **ğŸ¨ Produce**: Transform stored and modified data into a new block, display block, sound or particle.

ğŸ“š [Read the full documentation](https://docs.mcbookshelf.dev/en/latest/modules/block.html)

## ğŸ“– About Bookshelf

This module is part of the [Bookshelf Library](https://docs.mcbookshelf.dev/en/latest/index.html), a modular collection of Minecraft datapacks built to simplify complex systems and empower mapmakers.
